comments:
Using the 9/15 wtp+eclipse version:

When I select a J2EE Module dependency in a dynamic web project and press "Apply" I get a dialog stating "IWAE0010E An internal error occurred:". The system console (NOT the error log; for some reason this does not show anything) shows the following exceptions:

Closing as resolved since 1.5.1.  If this bug should not be closed, please reopen.
